  16. ‌#define CAML_INTERNALS

  36. /* Error reporting */

  38. ‌void caml_plat_fatal_error(const char * action, int err)
  39. {
  40.   char buf[1024];
  41.   caml_fatal_error("Fatal error during %s: %s\n",
  42.                    action, caml_strerror(err, buf, sizeof(buf)));
  43. }

  45. /* Mutexes */

  47. ‌void caml_plat_mutex_init(caml_plat_mutex * m)
  48. {
  49.   int rc;
  50.   pthread_mutexattr_t attr;
  51.   rc = pthread_mutexattr_init(&attr);
  52.   if (rc != 0) goto error1;
  53.   rc = pthread_mutexattr_settype(&attr, PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK);
  54.   if (rc != 0) goto error2;
  55.   rc = pthread_mutex_init(m, &attr);
  56.   // fall through
  57. error2:
  58.   pthread_mutexattr_destroy(&attr);
  59. error1:
  60.   check_err("mutex_init", rc);
  61. }

  63. ‌void caml_plat_assert_locked(caml_plat_mutex* m)
  64. {
  65. #ifdef DEBUG
  66.   int r = pthread_mutex_trylock(m);
  67.   if (r == EBUSY) {
  68.     /* ok, it was locked */
  69.     return;
  70.   } else if (r == 0) {
  71.     caml_fatal_error("Required mutex not locked");
  72.   } else {
  73.     check_err("assert_locked", r);
  74.   }
  75. #endif
  76. }

  78. ‌void caml_plat_assert_all_locks_unlocked(void)
  79. {
  80. #ifdef DEBUG
  81.   if (lockdepth) caml_fatal_error("Locks still locked at termination");
  82. #endif
  83. }

  85. ‌void caml_plat_mutex_free(caml_plat_mutex* m)
  86. {
  87.   check_err("mutex_free", pthread_mutex_destroy(m));
  88. }

  90. ‌static void caml_plat_cond_init_aux(caml_plat_cond *cond)
  91. {
  92.   pthread_condattr_t attr;
  93.   pthread_condattr_init(&attr);
  94. #if defined(_POSIX_TIMERS) && \
  95.     defined(_POSIX_MONOTONIC_CLOCK) && \
  96.     _POSIX_MONOTONIC_CLOCK != (-1)
  97.   pthread_condattr_setclock(&attr, CLOCK_MONOTONIC);
  98. #endif
  99.   pthread_cond_init(&cond->cond, &attr);
  100. }

  102. /* Condition variables */
  103. ‌void caml_plat_cond_init(caml_plat_cond* cond, caml_plat_mutex* m)
  104. {
  105.   caml_plat_cond_init_aux(cond);
  106.   cond->mutex = m;
  107. }

  109. ‌void caml_plat_wait(caml_plat_cond* cond)
  110. {
  111.   caml_plat_assert_locked(cond->mutex);
  112.   check_err("wait", pthread_cond_wait(&cond->cond, cond->mutex));
  113. }

  115. ‌void caml_plat_broadcast(caml_plat_cond* cond)
  116. {
  117.   caml_plat_assert_locked(cond->mutex);
  118.   check_err("cond_broadcast", pthread_cond_broadcast(&cond->cond));
  119. }

  121. ‌void caml_plat_signal(caml_plat_cond* cond)
  122. {
  123.   caml_plat_assert_locked(cond->mutex);
  124.   check_err("cond_signal", pthread_cond_signal(&cond->cond));
  125. }

  127. ‌void caml_plat_cond_free(caml_plat_cond* cond)
  128. {
  129.   check_err("cond_free", pthread_cond_destroy(&cond->cond));
  130.   cond->mutex=0;
  131. }


  134. /* Memory management */

  136. ‌static uintnat round_up(uintnat size, uintnat align) {
  137.   CAMLassert(Is_power_of_2(align));
  138.   return (size + align - 1) & ~(align - 1);
  139. }

  141. ‌intnat caml_plat_pagesize = 0;
  142. ‌intnat caml_plat_mmap_alignment = 0;

  144. ‌uintnat caml_mem_round_up_pages(uintnat size)
  145. {
  146.   return round_up(size, caml_plat_pagesize);
  147. }

  149. ‌#define Is_page_aligned(size) ((size & (caml_plat_pagesize - 1)) == 0)

  151. #ifdef DEBUG
  152. ‌static struct lf_skiplist mmap_blocks = {NULL};
  153. #endif

  155. #ifndef _WIN32
  156. #endif

  158. ‌void* caml_mem_map(uintnat size, uintnat alignment, int reserve_only)
  159. {
  160.   CAMLassert(Is_power_of_2(alignment));
  161.   CAMLassert(Is_page_aligned(size));
  162.   alignment = round_up(alignment, caml_plat_mmap_alignment);

  164. #ifdef DEBUG
  165.   if (mmap_blocks.head == NULL) {
  166.     /* The first call to caml_mem_map should be during caml_init_domains, called
  167.        by caml_init_gc during startup - i.e. before any domains have started. */
  168.     CAMLassert(atomic_load_acquire(&caml_num_domains_running) <= 1);
  169.     caml_lf_skiplist_init(&mmap_blocks);
  170.   }
  171. #endif

  173.   void* mem = caml_plat_mem_map(size, alignment, reserve_only);

  175.   if (mem == 0) {
  176.     caml_gc_message(0x1000, "mmap %" ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT "d bytes failed",
  177.                             size);
  178.     return 0;
  179.   }

  181.   caml_gc_message(0x1000, "mmap %" ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT "d"
  182.                           " bytes at %p for heaps\n", size, mem);

  184. #ifdef DEBUG
  185.   caml_lf_skiplist_insert(&mmap_blocks, (uintnat)mem, size);
  186. #endif

  188.   return mem;
  189. }

  191. ‌void* caml_mem_commit(void* mem, uintnat size)
  192. {
  193.   CAMLassert(Is_page_aligned(size));
  194.   caml_gc_message(0x1000, "commit %" ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT "d"
  195.                           " bytes at %p for heaps\n", size, mem);
  196.   return caml_plat_mem_commit(mem, size);
  197. }

  199. ‌void caml_mem_decommit(void* mem, uintnat size)
  200. {
  201.   if (size) {
  202.     caml_gc_message(0x1000, "decommit %" ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT "d"
  203.                             " bytes at %p for heaps\n", size, mem);
  204.     caml_plat_mem_decommit(mem, size);
  205.   }
  206. }

  208. ‌void caml_mem_unmap(void* mem, uintnat size)
  209. {
  210. #ifdef DEBUG
  211.   uintnat data;
  212.   CAMLassert(caml_lf_skiplist_find(&mmap_blocks, (uintnat)mem, &data) != 0);
  213.   CAMLassert(data == size);
  214. #endif
  215.   caml_gc_message(0x1000, "munmap %" ARCH_INTNAT_PRINTF_FORMAT "d"
  216.                           " bytes at %p for heaps\n", size, mem);
  217.   caml_plat_mem_unmap(mem, size);
  218. #ifdef DEBUG
  219.   caml_lf_skiplist_remove(&mmap_blocks, (uintnat)mem);
  220. #endif
  221. }

  223. ‌#define Min_sleep_ns       10000 // 10 us
  224. ‌#define Slow_sleep_ns    1000000 //  1 ms
  225. ‌#define Max_sleep_ns  1000000000 //  1 s

  227. ‌unsigned caml_plat_spin_wait(unsigned spins,
  228.                              const char* file, int line,
  229.                              const char* function)
  230. {
  231.   unsigned next_spins;
  232.   if (spins < Min_sleep_ns) spins = Min_sleep_ns;
  233.   if (spins > Max_sleep_ns) spins = Max_sleep_ns;
  234.   next_spins = spins + spins / 4;
  235.   if (spins < Slow_sleep_ns && Slow_sleep_ns <= next_spins) {
  236.     caml_gc_log("Slow spin-wait loop in %s at %s:%d", function, file, line);
  237.   }
  238.   usleep(spins/1000);
  239.   return next_spins;
  240. }
